# Launch PyAEDT

## Launch an HFSS instance locally
```{python}
#| eval: false
from ansys.aedt.core import Hfss
hfss = Hfss(
    version='2024.2',
    new_desktop=True,
    close_on_exit=True,
    non_graphical=False,
    project="project_name",
    design="design_name"
)
```

## Exit your local instance:
```{python}
#| eval: false
hfss.release_desktop()
```
